task.title: Explain deployment env vars for JWT_SECRET and DOMAIN
task.author: user

steps.summary: Asked how to set JWT_SECRET and DOMAIN for docker-compose deployment on a droplet with SSH access.
Reviewed deployment compose and Caddy config plus env example and README instructions. Evidence: deploy/docker-compose.yml, deploy/Caddyfile, deploy/.env.example, README.md.
Advise setting JWT_SECRET and optional DOMAIN via deploy/.env (or exported env) so compose substitutes values; DOMAIN enables Caddy HTTPS if DNS points to droplet.

final_summary: Outlined how to set JWT_SECRET and DOMAIN for docker-compose using deploy/.env or exported vars, and noted DNS/HTTPS behavior for Caddy.
